src:
ＤｅＮＡが森と合意、背番号６

02 Nov 2019

　ＤｅＮＡからドラフト１位指名された神奈川・桐蔭学園高の森敬斗内野手（１７）＝１７５センチ、７５キロ、右投げ左打ち＝の入団が２日、決まった。横浜市内のホテルで契約金１億円、年俸１千万円で合意し背番号は６に決定。「（金額の）数字を見てプロになるんだと実感した。走攻守の全てでトップレベルになりたい」と力強く語った。
　吉田孝司球団代表補佐兼スカウト部長は「空いている中で最もいい番号。看板選手になってほしい」と期待した。森は遊撃手として慣れ親しんだ番号をもらい「期待に応えられるように頑張りたい」と意気込んだ。（金額は推定）
text:
DeNA agrees with Mori, number 6

02 Nov 2019

ＮＡ Kanagawa and Toho Gakuen Takanomori Keito Infielder (17) = 175 centimeters, 75 km, left-handed and left-handed, who was named the first draft by DeNA, was decided on the 2nd. At a hotel in Yokohama city, a contract amount of 100 million yen and an annual salary of 10 million yen were agreed, and the number was determined to be 6. “I realized that I was going to be a professional by looking at the (amount of money) numbers.
”Takashi Yoshida, Deputy Representative and Head of Scout, hoped to be the best number available. Mori received a number that he was used to as a shortstop player, and was eager to do his best to meet his expectations. (The amount is estimated)
